per_frame_1=q2=1.5+.5*sin(.2*time);
per_frame_2=q3=.5+.1*(.6*sin(.1*time)+.4*sin(.15*time));
per_frame_3=q4=.5+.1*(.6*sin(.25*time)+.4*sin(.22*time));
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=q30=sin(.2*time);
per_frame_6=q31=cos(.2*time);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_PElosang1;
comp_2=`
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`
comp_6=`///polar mapping by flexi
comp_7=`
comp_8=`float2 c =float2(uv.x-q3,uv.y-q4)*aspect.xy;
comp_9=`float rad_hq = q2*length(c)-q2;
comp_10=`float ang_hq = atan2(c.x,c.y);
comp_11=`float2 polar =float2(ang_hq, rad_hq);    
comp_12=`
comp_13=`float2 uv1=uv+.5;
comp_14=`float2 rot=float2(uv1.x*q30,uv1.y*q31);
comp_15=`polar=polar-rot;
comp_16=`
comp_17=`
comp_18=`float4 ret1 = tex2D(sampler_PElosang1, polar * 2 );
comp_19=`
comp_20=`
comp_21=`ret=ret1;
comp_22=`}
